title: COVID-19 tracker: US life expectancy falls again; AZ's Evusheld nabs treatment nod
author: Zoey Becker; Kevin Dunleavy; Fraiser Kansteiner; Angus Liu
description: Due to drug overdoses and COVID-19 deaths, life expectancy in the U.S. has dropped for the second straight year. | Due to drug overdoses and COVID-19 deaths, life expectancy in the U.S. has dropped for the second straight year. Japan has become the first nation to sanction the use of AstraZeneca's Evusheld as a treatment for those infected with COVID-19. And more.
